title: How should I study mathematics and science? - Quora

response.answer_text: First of all you need to know that these two subjects are most easiest subjects. Reason being in other subjects you need to spend a lot of time cramming while maths and science are conceptual subjects. When you understand the concept then you can easily pass these with flying colors. For this you need to do just 2things 1)eliminate the thought that they are tough. 2)Listen to your school or tution teacher whom you think is good and then some practice. Thank you and hope that my answer could help you to overcome your fear.

If you are studing science, you can be a very good person by some of the following things:- Start thinking what you study in realityRise questions in yourself, why,when,how,where,what?Be updated with the modren technologyMake a very good use of the technologyShare things with your friends
